name: v1.1.0
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_elm", version = "1.1.0")

# Declare external elm dependencies, for example:
elm = use_extension("@rules_elm//elm:extensions.bzl", "elm")
elm.repository(
    name = "elm_package_elm_core",
    sha256 = "6e37b11c88c89a68d19d0c7625f1ef39ed70c59e443def95e4de98d6748c80a7",
    strip_prefix = "core-1.0.5",
    urls = ["https://github.com/elm/core/archive/1.0.5.tar.gz"],
)
use_repo(elm, "elm_package_elm_core")

```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_elm",
    sha256 = "cf8625aa30ed1d34e6c6d576ddf3c173dd6a4cf2e72f0315f64370a95631f096",
    strip_prefix = "rules_elm-1.1.0",
    urls = "https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/releases/download/v1.1.0/rules_elm-1.1.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_elm//elm:dependencies.bzl", "elm_dependencies")
elm_dependencies()
load("@rules_java//java:rules_java_deps.bzl", "rules_java_dependencies")
rules_java_dependencies()
load("@com_google_protobuf//:protobuf_deps.bzl", "protobuf_deps")
protobuf_deps()
load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")
py_repositories()
load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")
rules_js_dependencies()
load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")
py_repositories()

load("@rules_shell//shell:repositories.bzl", "rules_shell_toolchains")
rules_shell_toolchains()
load("@rules_elm//elm:repositories.bzl", "elm_register_toolchains")
elm_register_toolchains()
load("@rules_elm_npm//:repositories.bzl", elm_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")
elm_npm_repositories()

```

name: v1.0.1
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_elm", version = "1.0.1")

# Declare external elm dependencies, for example:
elm = use_extension("@rules_elm//elm:extensions.bzl", "elm")
elm.repository(
    name = "elm_package_elm_core",
    sha256 = "6e37b11c88c89a68d19d0c7625f1ef39ed70c59e443def95e4de98d6748c80a7",
    strip_prefix = "core-1.0.5",
    urls = ["https://github.com/elm/core/archive/1.0.5.tar.gz"],
)
use_repo(elm, "elm_package_elm_core")

```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_elm",
    sha256 = "cc113f718cbe04769bad65c29592d402367393480c5e8e2b7c82652fa8c1fe61",
    strip_prefix = "rules_elm-1.0.1",
    urls = "https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/releases/download/v1.0.1/rules_elm-1.0.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_elm//elm:dependencies.bzl", "elm_dependencies")
elm_dependencies()
load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")
rules_js_dependencies() # rules_elm depends on rules_js
load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")
py_repositories() # rules_elm depends on rules_python
load("@rules_elm//elm:repositories.bzl", "elm_register_toolchains")
elm_register_toolchains()
load("@rules_elm_npm//:repositories.bzl", elm_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")
elm_npm_repositories()

```


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/compare/v1.0.0...v1.0.1

name: v1.0.0
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_elm", version = "1.0.0")

# Declare external elm dependencies, for example:
elm = use_extension("@rules_elm//elm:extensions.bzl", "elm")
elm.repository(
    name = "elm_package_elm_core",
    sha256 = "6e37b11c88c89a68d19d0c7625f1ef39ed70c59e443def95e4de98d6748c80a7",
    strip_prefix = "core-1.0.5",
    urls = ["https://github.com/elm/core/archive/1.0.5.tar.gz"],
)
use_repo(elm, "elm_package_elm_core")

```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_elm",
    sha256 = "458463a9784ffc26af9bdb494b0e4e80e4d85cd184ddf3685b0264868b0c27ca",
    strip_prefix = "rules_elm-1.0.0",
    urls = "https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/releases/download/v1.0.0/rules_elm-1.0.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_elm//elm:dependencies.bzl", "elm_dependencies")
elm_dependencies()
load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")
rules_js_dependencies() # rules_elm depends on rules_js
load("@rules_python//python:repositories.bzl", "py_repositories")
py_repositories() # rules_elm depends on rules_python
load("@rules_elm//elm:repositories.bzl", "elm_register_toolchains")
elm_register_toolchains()
load("@rules_elm_npm//:repositories.bzl", elm_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")
elm_npm_repositories()

```


## What's Changed
* Upgrade to elm 0.19.1 by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/18
* Add initial bzlmod extension impl for elm_repository by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/24
* Update README.md by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/27
* Update README.md by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/31
* Use rules_js stable release 2.0.0 by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/33
* Use Parser.js module within test-finder by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/34
* Use toolchains repo instead of separate toolchains registration by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/35
* Extract sys.argv to val by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/36
* Rename com_github_edschouten_rules_elm -> rules_elm by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/40
* no-sandbox tag for bazel7 integration tests fix by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/41
* Add legacy workspace test case. by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/42
* Add legacy workspace testcases to examples/elm-proto by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/44
* legacy workspace test case for elm-test by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/45
* Legacy workspace test case for elm-todomvc by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/46
* Update README.md by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/47
* bcr config added by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/48
* Add release workflow by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/49
* fix: no dep on release job by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/50
* fix: chmod +x by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/51
* fix: bcr url by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/52
* Fix bcr presubmit job by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/53
* chore: #25 fix and def.bzl renamed to defs.bzl by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/54
* chore: attempt to improve github ci caching by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/55
* chore: get rid of "python" in flavor of rules_python by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/56
* chore: elm_toolchain_macro removal by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/57
* chore: do not call python when invoking elm_repository rule by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/58
* fix: use python instead gzip+chmod by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/59


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/compare/v0.4...v1.0.0

name: v1.0.0-rc1
body:
## Using bzlmod with Bazel 6 or later:

1. Add `common --enable_bzlmod` to `.bazelrc`.

2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_elm", version = "1.0.0-rc1")

# Declare external elm dependencies, for example:
elm = use_extension("@rules_elm//elm:extensions.bzl", "elm")
elm.repository(
    name = "elm_package_elm_core",
    sha256 = "6e37b11c88c89a68d19d0c7625f1ef39ed70c59e443def95e4de98d6748c80a7",
    strip_prefix = "core-1.0.5",
    urls = ["https://github.com/elm/core/archive/1.0.5.tar.gz"],
)
use_repo(elm, "elm_package_elm_core")

```

## Using WORKSPACE:

```starlark

load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_elm",
    sha256 = "99cc122e39f24bd0ce65550aae2af481f6336df6577fd3ae98f6faa50dc67972",
    strip_prefix = "rules_elm-1.0.0-rc1",
    urls = "https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/releases/download/v1.0.0-rc1/rules_elm-1.0.0-rc1.tar.gz",
)

load("@rules_elm//elm:dependencies.bzl", "elm_dependencies")
elm_dependencies()
load("@aspect_rules_js//js:repositories.bzl", "rules_js_dependencies")
rules_js_dependencies() # rules_elm depends on rules_js
load("@rules_elm//elm:repositories.bzl", "elm_register_toolchains")
elm_register_toolchains()
load("@rules_elm_npm//:repositories.bzl", elm_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")
elm_npm_repositories()

```


## What's Changed
* Upgrade to elm 0.19.1 by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/18
* Add initial bzlmod extension impl for elm_repository by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/24
* Update README.md by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/27
* Update README.md by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/31
* Use rules_js stable release 2.0.0 by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/33
* Use Parser.js module within test-finder by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/34
* Use toolchains repo instead of separate toolchains registration by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/35
* Extract sys.argv to val by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/36
* Rename com_github_edschouten_rules_elm -> rules_elm by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/40
* no-sandbox tag for bazel7 integration tests fix by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/41
* Add legacy workspace test case. by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/42
* Add legacy workspace testcases to examples/elm-proto by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/44
* legacy workspace test case for elm-test by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/45
* Legacy workspace test case for elm-todomvc by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/46
* Update README.md by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/47
* bcr config added by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/48
* Add release workflow by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/49
* fix: no dep on release job by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/50
* fix: chmod +x by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/51
* fix: bcr url by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/52


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/compare/v0.4...v1.0.0-rc1

name: v0.4
body:
Significant note: This is the last release before major code refactoring happened within https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/18

## What's Changed
* Fix bazel errors by @mksmtn in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/5
* Remove the dependency on `@nodejs//:node_runfiles` by @aherrmann in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/6
* Add support for generated source files by @aherrmann in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/7
* Resolves #11 by @VignetteTones in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/12
* Make elm_test::node attribute public. by @kczulko-da in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/13
* Add elm_proto_library simple test. Additional support for bazel6 by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/15
* Attempt to add macos to ci by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/16
* Avoid name clashes when Main module is used as a test dependency. by @kczulko in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/17

## New Contributors
* @mksmtn made their first contribution in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/5
* @aherrmann made their first contribution in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/6
* @VignetteTones made their first contribution in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/12
* @kczulko-da made their first contribution in https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/pull/13

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/kczulko/rules_elm/compare/v0.3...v0.4

name: v0.3
body:
- Suppress Python stack traces in error output.
- Fix the build of tests when `-c opt` is passed in.
- Add integrated support for invoking UglifyJS properly.

name: v0.2
body:
- Make `elm_proto_library()` functional.
- Let `elm_repository()` use `elm_library()` instead of `elm_package()` where possible. This disables Elm's package SAT solving, which doesn't print user-friendly errors in our case.
- Add `patches` to `elm_repository()` to permit application of local patches to Elm packages.
- Make `elm_binary()` respect the compilation mode, allowing you to build with the time traveling debugger enabled.
